name: dragon ball stitch fighterz
description:
this is a fangame of dragon ball fighterz.

controls: P1 A and D to move. to attack: Q, E and R. final smash: T and i together
P2: arrow keys to move. to attack: m, n and b to use final smash: C and Z together.

PLS PLAY ON SMALL SCREEN THE GAME CAN GLITCH IN FULL SCREEN!!! but if you begin the fight you can full screen

new update! some bugs are fixed because if you retry so much and spam the final smash the floor will just breake
